entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create validator for workloads to make sure that they follow the right format and guidance #22224
    7.0.1xx
  • Build fails on ARM64 Linux, likely because of issue with workload SDK resolver #22221
  • dotnet-sdk installs bogus `~/.dotnet/tools` entry as `/etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools` #22214
  • Add support for `dotnet add package [package] --prelease` #22206
  • dotnet publish output option copy old packages to the publish folder #22220
  • Web Application build error with net6.0 framework, Failed to sign apphost with error code 0 #22201
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-115300-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #22192

Closed

  • Could not execute because the application was not found or a compatible .NET SDK is not installed. #14916
    6.0.1xx
  • Optional Workload Acquisition #14957
    6.0.1xx
  • When a workload is missing, trigger the product acquisition experience #14953
    6.0.1xx
  • Given the npukg and manifest from workload owner, a tool can convert to an msi #14952
    6.0.1xx
  • Admin install for optional workloads #14956
    6.0.1xx
  • Users can more easily acquire the SDK and runtimes on CI machines and other non-admin installs #14959
    7.0.1xx
  • VS mac update/installer - .NET SDK integration #16484
    6.0.1xx
  • Command line build fails but works in Visual Studio #21715

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove Hot Reload support from dotnet watch #22217
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fixup some dependencies #22216
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move all shared workload options to install command #22190
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.C… #22213
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix up-to-date check on static web assets #22045
    Area-AspNetCore
